findingPerson: Finding the right person is harder than finding a good oat milk cappuccino in 2012.
sucksText: Dating apps suck. Networking is awkward. Making new friends as an adult is basically illegal. Travel buddies either ruin your trip or disappear when the bill comes. Business partners? Might as well be a toxic ex with equity.
thereIsWay: There has to be a better way. There is. It’s

features.title: Networking?
features.description: LinkedIn DMs from people trying to sell you crypto.

features.title: Friendships?
features.description: Texting “we should totally catch up soon” for the third year in a row.

features.title: Travel partners?
features.description: You said “relaxed trip.” They made a color-coded itinerary.

features.title: Business partners?
features.description: Might as well be a toxic ex with equity.

rightPeople: You don’t need more people in your contacts. You need <bold>the right people</bold> in your life.

info.heading: What Is Uniic?
paragraphs: Uniic is <bold>not</bold> another dating app, networking site, or “exclusive community” that just sells you a membership.
It’s the <bold>first platform that actually finds people you’re compatible with</bold> — across dating, friendship, travel, sports, and business.
Using <bold>psychometric testing</bold>, Uniic finds the right people for you based on:

categories.title: Dating
categories.desc: So your next relationship doesn’t feel like an ongoing attachment experiment

categories.title: Friendship
categories.desc: Because finding real friends after 30 shouldn’t require a personal assistant

categories.title: Travel
categories.desc: No more mismatched travel styles and passive-aggressive itinerary fights

categories.title: Sports
categories.desc: Actually find a gym buddy who doesn’t flake after two sessions

categories.title: Business
categories.desc: A co-founder or collaborator who doesn’t disappear when things get hard

title: How It Works?

steps.desc: Answer a few questions. We analyze your dating life, friendships, and potential as a business partner.
Find people who won’t make you wish you’d canceled.

Because life is too short for bad relationships, dead-end friendships, and unreliable
gym partners.

question: Talk to us
messageTooShort: Message must be at least 5 characters

ptitle: Terms and Conditions for Uniic App
date: Effective Date: 18th January 2025 | Last Updated: 22nd January 2025
intro: Welcome to Uniic ("the App"), a global social connections and personal development platform currently in beta development, designed to connect users through meaningful interactions and tools for growth. By accessing or using the App, you agree to these Terms and Conditions ("Terms"). If you do not agree to these Terms, you must discontinue use of the App immediately.

acceptance.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
points: You are at least 18 years old or the legal age of majority in your jurisdiction.
You have read, understood, and agreed to these Terms.
You will comply with all applicable laws and regulations in your region.

collect.title: 2.1 Data We Collect
items: Personal Information: Name, email address, phone number, age, gender, and other profile details.
Beta Testing Feedback: Crash logs, error reports, and user feedback.
Usage Data: Interactions with the App, questionnaire responses, navigation history.

usage.title: 2.2 How We Use Your Data
items: To notify you about App updates and improvements.
To collect feedback and improve the App during beta.
To send you marketing or informational content where permitted.

sharing.title: 2.3 Data Sharing
items: Shared with trusted third parties under confidentiality.
Not sold to third parties.
May be disclosed if required by law or legal processes.

rights.title: 2.4 Your Rights
items: You have the right to access, correct, or delete your data.
Unsubscribe or request deletion via contact@uniic.app.

ios.title: 3.1 iOS TestFlight
ios.desc: Available via Apple TestFlight. You agree to Apple’s terms and conditions.

android.title: 3.2 Android Beta Testing
android.desc: Available on Android. You agree to applicable beta terms.

limitations.title: 3.3 Beta Testing Limitations
items: Beta version is provided "AS IS".
No liability for bugs or issues.
Feedback is appreciated but not compensated.

email.title: 4. Email and Phone Number Use
items: We may contact you for updates or marketing.
You can opt out of non-essential messages.
Your data is stored securely.

global.title: 5. Global Applicability
global.desc: These Terms aim to comply with global data protection standards, including user rights and data transparency.

liability.title: 6. Liability Disclaimer
items: App is provided "AS IS" without warranties.
Uniic is not liable for beta-related damages.
Liability limited to any amount you paid (if any).

ip.title: 7. Intellectual Property
items: All content and trademarks belong to Uniic or licensors.
No copying or distribution without permission.

termination.title: 8. Termination of Access
items: Access may be terminated for violations.
You may leave beta by uninstalling the App.

amendments.title: 9. Amendments to Terms
amendments.desc: Terms may be updated at any time. Updates will be communicated through email or the App. Continued use signifies acceptance.

contact.title: 10. Contact Information
contact.desc: For questions or concerns, contact: support@uniic.app
